```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(tm)
library(SnowballC)
```

```{r}
en_US_blogs <- read_delim("data/en_US/en_US.blogs.txt.gz", "\t", escape_double = FALSE, col_names = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE)
```

```{r}
corp <- Corpus(VectorSource(en_US_blogs$X1))
corp <- tm_map(corp, tolower)
corp <- tm_map(corp, PlainTextDocument)
corp <- tm_map(removePunctuation)
corp <- tm_map(corp, removeWords, stopwords("english"))
dtm <- DocumentTermMatrix(corp)
blogs <- as_tibble(as.matrix(dtm))

```
